title: House For Sale - 3Br/2Ba
text: 3/2 House in older area. No bids at last week's auction.

title: Start A Company part Time
text: Invent a new way of making widgets. No profits during startup. Long hours, no extra pay.

title: Stock - MYT4U Electronic Co.
text: Low Interest rates lead to substantial share price for this home electronics seller

title: Stock - MYT4U Electronic Co.
text: Electronics seller headed by a 32 year old harvard grad.

title: Mutual Fund - GRO4US Fund
text: Powerhouse market drives strong fund's price upt to record high.

title: Stock - MYT4U Electronic Co.
text: Company Reorganizes. Massive Losses. Stockholders lose half their ownership rights.

title: Certificate Of Deposit
text: Bank offers nice certificate of deposit. Guaranteed interest and redeemable after any holding period.

title: Stock - MYT4U Electronic Co.
text: Things are going so well for the company that their stocks have just split!

title: Sister-in-law Borrows Money
text: Sister-in-law is downsized. Needs $5,000 to make house payments. She promises to pay you back $10,000 after she finds a new job.

title: Stock - ON2U Entertainment Co.
text: Newest theme park loses record amount. Share price hits all time low.

title: Condo For Sale
text: Excellent 2/1 Condo with many extras. For sale due to business success of owner. She's moving up, so can you.

title: Stock - OK4U Electronic Co.
text: Things are going so well for the company that their stocks have just split!

title: Friend Needs Cash Quick
text: A Friend has urgent need for money. Will sell you 10 one-ounce gold Krugerrands, will below going rate, for $300 each.

title: House For Sale - 3Br/2Ba
text: Low down payment to pick up this 3/2 house. Owner/seller unexpectedly moving out of town. Right person will do well.

title: Condo For Sale - 2Br/1Ba
text: Bank foreclosure! Located is desirable neighborhood close to jobs and stores.

title: House For Sale - 3Br/2Ba
text: Not lived in for 6 months. This bank-foreclosed house just reduced.

title: 10 Acres raw land
text: Wonderful park-like setting with stream on 10 acres in underdeveloped area.
